description: The Football Association of Wales will not bid to host the 2027 Uefa Women's Champions League final, but instead seek to hold it in Cardiff on a later date.
title: Women's Champions League: FAW to defer bid to host 2027 final
title_page: Women's Champions League: FAW to defer bid to host 2027 final - BBC Sport
maintext:
The Football Association of Wales (FAW) has deferred its bid to host the 2027 Uefa Women's Champions League final to a later date.
The FAW remains committed to staging the game at Cardiff's Principality Stadium, which hosted the men's Champions League final in 2017.
But following talks with the Welsh Government and Cardiff Council, the FAW has taken the joint decision to focus its efforts on 2028 or 2029.
